title: How do I send contact information via MMS?
answer:
For EMUI 2.3, touch and hold the contact that you want to send in the contact list, select Share > Messaging, select MMS vCard and then send the MMS by following the on-screen prompts. 

 For EMUI 3.0, touch and hold the contact that you want to send in the contact list, select Share contacts > Messaging, select MMS vCard and then send the MMS by following the on-screen prompts.
keywords: contact information, multimedia messages, send vCard
